languages.text: "Убери эту кощунственную мерзость с глаз. От жалких попыток деградантного нелюдя привлечь к себе внимание мне тошно. Единственное, что стоит сейчас между ним и смертью — твои привилегии Вольного Торговца, дарующие право таскать в своей свите сей ксеномусор. Как бы я ни желала, я не преступлю закон здесь, где вершится правосудие Его".

"Remove that profane filth from my sight. It sickens me to observe the degraded inhuman's pathetic attempts at vying for attention. The only thing that stays its immediate death are your Rogue Trader's privileges that grant you the right to drag around such xenos refuse in your retinue. However desperate my wish to exterminate it might be, I shall not go against the word of the law here, in a place where His solemn justice is served."
languages.original_text: "Убери эту кощунственную мерзость с глаз. От жалких попыток деградантного нелюдя привлечь к себе внимание мне тошно. Единственное, что стоит сейчас между ним и смертью — твои привилегии Вольного Торговца, дарующие право таскать в своей свите сей ксеномусор. Как бы я ни желала, я не преступлю закон здесь, где вершится правосудие Его".

languages.text: “快让这个污秽之物从我眼前消失。看着这只堕落的异型想要吸引目光的可悲行为，只会让我觉得恶心。它之所以还能活着，仅仅是因为你享有行商浪人的特权罢了，你有权把这只异形渣滓收为你的随从。哪怕我再怎么迫切地想要消灭它，我都不会在这个地方违背帝国的律法。这里是律法的大厅，神皇严峻的正义必将得到伸张。”
languages.original_text: "Remove that profane filth from my sight. It sickens me to observe the degraded inhuman's pathetic attempts at vying for attention. The only thing that stays its immediate death are your Rogue Trader's privileges that grant you the right to drag around such xenos refuse in your retinue. However desperate my wish to exterminate it might be, I shall not go against the word of the law here, in a place where His solemn justice is served."

traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「私の視界から、そのおぞましい汚染を消せ。劣化した人間が注目の的になろうと競い合う、哀れな試みは不愉快だ。唯一残されるのは、そのような異種族の供人たちを連れて回れる自由開拓者の特権だけだ。全滅させようと必死に願っているが、法には逆らえない。主の厳粛な正義が果たされる地なのだから」
languages.original_text: "Remove that profane filth from my sight. It sickens me to observe the degraded inhuman's pathetic attempts at vying for attention. The only thing that stays its immediate death are your Rogue Trader's privileges that grant you the right to drag around such xenos refuse in your retinue. However desperate my wish to exterminate it might be, I shall not go against the word of the law here, in a place where His solemn justice is served."

traits.locale_text: 「私の視界から、そのおぞましい汚染を消せ。劣化した人間が注目の的になろうと競い合う、哀れな試みは不愉快だ。唯一残されるのは、そのような異種族の供人たちを連れて回れる自由開拓者の特権だけだ。全滅させようと必死に願っているが、法には逆らえない。主の厳粛な正義が果たされる地なのだから」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Aparte esa inmundicia profana de mi vista. Me da asco presenciar los intentos patéticos de ser el centro de atención. Lo único que evita su muerte son sus privilegios de Comerciante Independiente, que le otorgan el derecho a arrastrar semejante basura xenos en su séquito. Por mucho que desee exterminarlo, no iré contra la ley, aquí donde sirve Su solemne justicia».
languages.original_text: "Remove that profane filth from my sight. It sickens me to observe the degraded inhuman's pathetic attempts at vying for attention. The only thing that stays its immediate death are your Rogue Trader's privileges that grant you the right to drag around such xenos refuse in your retinue. However desperate my wish to exterminate it might be, I shall not go against the word of the law here, in a place where His solemn justice is served."

Por mucho que desee exterminarlo, no iré contra la ley, aquí donde sirve Su solemne justicia».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Schafft mir diesen ketzerischen Abschaum aus den Augen. Es widert mich an, wie dieser entartete Unmensch derart erbärmlich darum kämpft, zum Mittelpunkt der Aufmerksamkeit zu werden. Ich habe ihn nur deswegen noch nicht hingerichtet, weil Euch Eure Privilegien als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} das Recht geben, solchen Xenos-Abschaum in Eurem Gefolge mitzuschleppen. So groß mein Wunsch auch sein mag, ihn auszulöschen: Ich werde hier nicht gegen das Gesetz verstoßen, an einem Ort, wo des Imperators feierliche Gerechtigkeit waltet."
languages.original_text: "Remove that profane filth from my sight. It sickens me to observe the degraded inhuman's pathetic attempts at vying for attention. The only thing that stays its immediate death are your Rogue Trader's privileges that grant you the right to drag around such xenos refuse in your retinue. However desperate my wish to exterminate it might be, I shall not go against the word of the law here, in a place where His solemn justice is served."

traits.locale_text: "Schafft mir diesen ketzerischen Abschaum aus den Augen. Es widert mich an, wie dieser entartete Unmensch derart erbärmlich darum kämpft, zum Mittelpunkt der Aufmerksamkeit zu werden. Ich habe ihn nur deswegen noch nicht hingerichtet, weil Euch Eure Privilegien als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} das Recht geben, solchen Xenos-Abschaum in Eurem Gefolge mitzuschleppen. So groß mein Wunsch auch sein mag, ihn auszulöschen: Ich werde hier nicht gegen das Gesetz verstoßen, an einem Ort, wo des Imperators feierliche Gerechtigkeit waltet."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Enlevez cette vermine impie de ma vue. J'ai la nausée en voyant cette créature non-humaine dégénérée tenter pitoyablement d'attirer l'attention. La seule chose qui m'empêche de la tuer sur-le-champ sont vos privilèges de libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} qui vous donnent le droit d'avoir un xénos à vos côtés. Bien que je brûle de l'éliminer, je ne dois pas bafouer la loi dans un endroit où l'on applique Sa justice avec toute la solennité de rigueur. »
languages.original_text: "Remove that profane filth from my sight. It sickens me to observe the degraded inhuman's pathetic attempts at vying for attention. The only thing that stays its immediate death are your Rogue Trader's privileges that grant you the right to drag around such xenos refuse in your retinue. However desperate my wish to exterminate it might be, I shall not go against the word of the law here, in a place where His solemn justice is served."

traits.locale_text: « Enlevez cette vermine impie de ma vue. J'ai la nausée en voyant cette créature dégénérée tenter pitoyablement d'attirer l'attention. La seule chose qui m'empêche de la tuer sur-le-champ sont vos privilèges de libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} qui vous donnent le droit d'avoir un xénos à vos côtés. Bien que je brûle de l'éliminer, je ne dois pas bafouer la loi dans un endroit où l'on applique Sa justice avec toute la solennité de rigueur. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Şu günahkâr pisliği çekin gözümün önünden. Bu çaresiz insan dışının ilgiyi üzerine çekmek için yaptığı ezik teşebbüslere şahit olmak bile midemi bulandırıyor. Derhâl öldürülmesini engelleyen tek şey, Hür Tacir'in böylesi bir zeno atığını maiyetinde barındırma imtiyazına sahip olması. Onu yok etme arzum ne kadar yoğun olursa olsun, O'nun adaletinin yürürlükte olduğu bu yerde kanunlara karşı gelmeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Remove that profane filth from my sight. It sickens me to observe the degraded inhuman's pathetic attempts at vying for attention. The only thing that stays its immediate death are your Rogue Trader's privileges that grant you the right to drag around such xenos refuse in your retinue. However desperate my wish to exterminate it might be, I shall not go against the word of the law here, in a place where His solemn justice is served."

traits.locale_text: "Şu din dışı pisliği çekin gözümün önünden. Bu çaresiz insan dışının ilgiyi üzerine çekmek için yaptığı ezik teşebbüslere şahit olmak bile midemi bulandırıyor. Derhâl öldürülmesini engelleyen tek şey, Hür Tacir'inizin böylesi bir zeno atığını maiyetinde barındırma imtiyazına sahip olması. Onu yok etme arzum ne kadar yoğun olursa olsun, O'nun adaletinin yürürlükte olduğu bu yerde, kanunlara karşı gelecek değilim."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
